introduction: The cinema lobby is a celebrated space for gossip. While waiting in line or drinking some wine, people typically like to use their time to exchange gossip – far from trivial, such idle talk is the productive stuff out of which relationships and reputations are made or unmade and new possibili- ties of difference are envisioned. In order to enable such ephemeral moments, CHEAP will work behind a glamorous circular cocktail bar in the austere silver Filmhaus Atrium. There will also be a lovely boutique with CHEAP products and specially selected necessities. For the first time, CHEAP and Special Guests will present the highly sought-after CHEAPy Underground über alles Award.
